note: Granddaughters of the witches* you couldn’t burn … We’re Aussie-based global activists. We run boycott campaigns aimed at advertisers who fund media hate & lies. Our finest moment (so far) was when shock-jock Alan Jones was sacked for horrific misogyny. Now we’re fighting Murdoch’s #NewsCorpse. Read more (& donate) at mfw.org.au.  [*Shhh, we’re not real witches: the name is via politician Peter Dutton, who called a journo a Mad Fucking Witch but oops sent the text to her instead of his mate.]
